hanzi-su-wiki:
妃

Значения

Принцесса

Мнемоника

Своя 己 девушка 女 т.е. любовница. Позднее — принцесса.

koohiiStory2: Be careful you don´t pick up a drag queen at a club - they might look like women, but they have a snake down there!
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A woman sees herself (oneself) as a princess or a queen. As women should!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Just remember, when you're around other women (and woman-aligned peoples), it's important to treat each other like princess and queens, not just oneself.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: All of us princesses and queens share a special heat (ひ). When we see another princess or queen that heat passes through us and we nod to one another.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: All princess and queens can feel the heat coming off of the others.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 后 (きさき、コウ императрица). Не путать: 姫 (ひめ、キ барышня).

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the woman (女) made herself (己) into a queen
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle starts from " female " from " Jie ", or from " female " but from " concubine ". It is like a male and a female kneeling. It has the meaning of a pair and a spouse. It is an ancient word for " concubine " (Qiu Xigui) , The original meaning is spouse. "Said Wen": "Concubine, Pi Ye. Cong Nu, Ji Sheng."

According to Wang Fengyang's research, the original meaning of " concubine " is spouse, referring to both spouses, regardless of gender. "Zuo Zhuan. In the Second Year of Huan Gong: "To give a gift to a princess is a concubine, and to resent a princess is a hatred." In ancient times, men were inferior to women. In the case of men courting and women marrying, the " concubine " gradually focused on the woman. "Er Ya. "Exegesis" interprets " concubine " as "he also", "pair also", "comparable also", meaning a pair, matching, and spouse. " Princess " no part of this hierarchy, Duan "Annotation": "Princess and down this generic term, later said that your ears." Later, only then the emperor's wife had "called back " concubines in The noble one is called " concubine "; the wife of the prince and prince is also called " concubine ." Du Mu, "Passing Huaqing Palace": "A ride on the red concubine laughs, no one knows that it is the litchi." "Concubine" refers to Concubine Yang.

The inscriptions from " female " and " ji " are used as female surnames. Bronze " female ", " has left" no other, also for the " already " under the " female form" of. Therefore, Chen Jian and Ji Xusheng believed that the inscription "妀" and later generations " concubine " are the same characters. The inscription "妀" means the surname of a woman, and it is not the same word as the " concubine " in later generations. Later, "妀" refers to the surname and " concubine " refers to the wife. "Shuowen": "Yuan, female characters. Congnu, my voice."
humanum_short_description_en: Xiaozhuan " concubine " starts from " female " and " ji ". The original meaning is spouse, later refers to wife, and later refers specifically to the emperor's concubine, or the wife of prince and prince.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「女」從「卩」，或不從「女」而從「妾」，象一男一女跪坐之形，有一對、配偶之義，是「妃」的古字(裘錫圭)，本義是配偶。《說文》：「妃，匹也。从女，己聲。」

　　根據王鳳陽的研究，「妃」的本義是配偶，指夫妻雙方，無分男女。《左傳．桓公二年》：「嘉偶曰妃，怨偶曰仇。」古時男尊女卑，在男子求偶，女子嫁人的情況下，「妃」漸漸側重於女方了。《爾雅．釋詁》解釋「妃」為「合也」、「對也」、「媲也」，表示一對、匹配、配偶的意思。「妃」本無分尊卑，段玉裁《說文解字注》：「妃本上下通稱，後人以為貴稱耳。」後來才把皇帝的正室稱為「后」，姬妾中尊貴者稱為「妃」；又把太子、王侯的正妻稱為「妃」。杜牧〈過華清宮〉：「一騎紅塵妃子笑，無人知是荔枝來。」「妃子」指楊貴妃。

　　金文從「女」，「己」聲，用為女姓。金文「女」、「己」左右無別，亦有作上「己」下「女」之形。所以陳劍、季旭昇認為金文「妀」與後世「妃」是同形異字，金文「妀」表示女的姓氏，與後世解作王侯之妻的「妃」並非同字。後來才把「妀」指姓氏，「妃」指妻子。《說文》：「妀，女字也。从女，己聲。」
humanum_short_description: 小篆「妃」從「女」，「己」聲，本義是配偶，後指妻子，再後來專指皇帝的姬妾，或太子和王侯的妻子。

甲骨文從「 女 」從「 卩 」，或不從「 女 」而從「 妾 」，象一男一女跪坐之形，有一對、配偶之義，是「 妃 」的古字(裘錫圭)，本義是配偶。《說文》：「妃，匹也。从女，己聲。」 根據王鳳陽的研究，「 妃 」的本義是配偶，指夫妻雙方，無分男女。《左傳．桓公二年》：「嘉偶曰妃，怨偶曰仇。」古時男尊女卑，在男子求偶，女子嫁人的情況下，「 妃 」漸漸側重於女方了。《爾雅．釋詁》解釋「 妃 」為「合也」、「對也」、「媲也」，表示一對、匹配、配偶的意思。「 妃 」本無分尊卑，段玉裁《說文解字注》：「妃本上下通稱，後人以為貴稱耳。」後來才把皇帝的正室稱為「 后 」，姬妾中尊貴者稱為「 妃 」；又把太子、王侯的正妻稱為「 妃 」。杜牧〈過華清宮〉：「一騎紅塵妃子笑，無人知是荔枝來。」「妃子」指楊貴妃。 金文從「 女 」，「 己 」聲，用為女姓。金文「 女 」、「 己 」左右無別，亦有作上「 己 」下「 女 」之形。所以陳劍、季旭昇認為金文「 妀 」與後世「 妃 」是同形異字，金文「 妀 」表示女的姓氏，與後世解作王侯之妻的「 妃 」並非同字。後來才把「 妀 」指姓氏，「 妃 」指妻子。《說文》：「妀，女字也。从女，己聲。」

妃字的基本解释

妃
fēi
帝王的妻，位次于皇后；亦指太子、王、侯的妻：妃子。妃嫔。
古代对神女的尊称：天妃。宓妃。
古同“绯”，粉红色。

妃
pèi
古同“配”，婚配。

妃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fēi］
［《廣韻》芳非切，平微，敷。］
亦作“婓1”。亦作“媐2”。亦作“1”。
(1)配偶；妻。
(2)后世专指皇帝的姬妾，太子和王侯的妻。
(3)女神之尊称。
(4)某一事物的对立面。因其既相反又相成，故称。
(5)通“緋”。参见“妃色”。
[②]［pèi］
［《廣韻》滂佩切，去隊，滂。］
(1)匹配；婚配。
(2)配合；辅佐。

妃字的英文翻译

◎ 妃
the wife of a prince

妃字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妃； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页255第22
【廣韻】芳非切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】芳微切，?音霏。【說文】匹也。【總要】女與已身儔也。古?御之貴，次于后者曰妃。【禮·檀弓】舜葬於蒼梧之野，蓋三妃未之從也。　又太子之嫡室亦曰妃。　又天妃，水神。【司馬光曰】水隂類，其神當爲女子。　又湘妃，竹名。其斑如淚痕，出古辢者佳，出陶虛山中次之。見【竹譜】。　又【集韻】盈之切，音怡。與姬同。衆妾總稱。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?滂佩切，音配。【禮·曲禮】天子之妃曰后。【註】妃，配也。【衛風·氓詩序】喪其妃耦。【前漢·呂后紀】高祖微時妃。?與配同。　或作?。別作婜。　又與婓通。詳婓字註。

妃字的源字形

妃字的起名意思

：指匹配，婚配，配合，辅佐。

[①] [fēi]
["Guang Yun" Fang Fei cut, flat and small, apply. ]
Also known as "婓1". Also known as "媐2". Also known as "1".
(1) Spouse; Wife.
(2) Later generations refer exclusively to the emperor’s concubines, princes and princes’ wives.
(3) The title of goddess.
(4) The opposite of a certain thing. It is called because it is both opposite and complementary.
(5) Pass "Fei". See "Concubine".
[②]［pèi］
["Guangyun" Peng Peiqie, go to the team, Peng. ]
(1) Match; match.
(2) Cooperate; assist.

Radicals: 女, 己  (woman, oneself)
Meaning Mnemonic
A woman sees herself (oneself) as a princess or a queen. As women should!
Just remember, when you're around other women (and woman-aligned peoples), it's important to treat each other like princess and queens, not just oneself.
Reading Mnemonic
All of us princesses and queens share a special heat (ひ). When we see another princess or queen that heat passes through us and we nod to one another.
All princess and queens can feel the heat coming off of the others.
